DOC.brief_summary: The study explore feasibility Eye-Movement-Desensitization Reprocessing ( EMDR ) non-specific chronic back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Eye Movement Desensitization Reprocessing ( EMDR ) Non-specific Chronic Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The study explore feasibility Eye-Movement-Desensitization Reprocessing ( EMDR ) non-specific chronic back pain randomize control trial ( RCT ) 6 month follow-up . The treatment consist 12-sessions EMDR 60 minute use eye-movements bilateral stimulation addition treatment usual ( TAU ) compare TAU alone .
DOC.criteria: > = 18 year nonspecific chronic low back pain > = 45 days/3 month high emotional distress cause psychological trauma German language skill specific cause chronic back pain application retirement pension pending ongoing psychotherapy severe physical psychiatric comorbidity
